channel.title: Posts on Amiel's Election Analytics Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Amiel's Election Analytics Blog

item.title: 2022 Midterm Forecast Introduction
item.description: This blog is part of a series related to Gov 1347: Election Analytics, a course at Harvard University taught by Professor Ryan D. Enos. From now until November 3, I will be updating this weekly blog series with my 2022 US midterm election prediction model. For this first blog, Iâ€™ll be comparing the 2012 House election results to the 2014 House Midterm election results to find any trends in the data during a democratic presidential term.
